ack.p: The authors are grateful to Jianhua Yu, Chunqin Bai, XiaoFeng Xuan, Hongxin Xu, Shengkui Zhao, and Sihang Liu for contributions to the implementation of this project in the field.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was supported by the China National AIDS Program, the National Science and Technology Major Project on Prevention and Treatment of Major Infectious Diseases including AIDS and Viral Hepatitis (grant number 2012ZX10001â€“007), and by the AbbVie. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets used and/or analyzed during the current study are availablefrom the corresponding author upon reasonable request.
